concept.title: 225.401-71 Products or services in support of operations in Afghanistan.

conbody.p: When acquiring products or services, other than small arms, in support of operations in Afghanistan if using a procedure specified in 225.7703-1 (a) (2) or (3), the procedures of subpart 25.4 are not applicable.
